article_title: Skier dies on Aspen Mountain – The Denver Post
article_text:
ASPEN — A male skier died Saturday after colliding with a tree on the lower Bellisimo run on Aspen Mountain.

Authorities identified the man as Jonathan Stuart, a 56 -year -old Aspen resident.

Stuart was spotted off the side of the trail by a passing skier, who then called the Ski Patrol at 2:42 p.m. The Ski Patrol responded immediately, but the man was unconscious and unresponsive.

Read the full story at The Aspen Times.
article_summary:
ASPEN — A male skier died Saturday after colliding with a tree on the lower Bellisimo run on Aspen Mountain.
Read the full story at The Aspen Times.
Stuart was spotted off the side of the trail by a passing skier, who then called the Ski Patrol at 2:42 p.m.
The Ski Patrol responded immediately, but the man was unconscious and unresponsive.
Authorities identified the man as Jonathan Stuart, a 56 -year -old Aspen resident.
